column4: Will someone please help me with this, my system is unusable without the system menu's, i've been a gnome user for all of 2 days, i dont know any of the application names to i cant launch then manually...
I don't care how many settings i lose, i need those menu's back
what were you doing when the dissapeared?
why do those bastards even target linux at all, tell them to pester billy gates
